numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there is no drastic change until 99.9.
2. I noticed that there is a small drop under average for middle-class people.
3. I wonder if the number of family members who attended the college before the student affected the admission of the student in the legacy group.
4. I want to see if there is any change now.
5. Many colleges desire to diversify their student body.
6. I live in a college town.
8. The college has many legacy students.
9. It is hard to get into the college.
